Interface Obstacle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BumperObstacleLine, ButtonObstacle, ObstacleLine, PseudoPaddle

    interface Obstacle
    interface for all obstacles in the game to follow.
    Version:
    v4.0 June 12th, 2014
    Author:
    Jason P'ng

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getBounce()
      The bounce factor a ball should experience when colliding.
      int getScore()
      The score that should be rewarded when hit.
